about_the_game:
Explore a collection of expertly crafted cocktails (alcoholic and non-alcoholic) infused with a unique game-inspired twist. From refreshing potions to tantalizing sweet elixirs, each recipe promises to transport you to the immersive world of Serum. Sip on your very own "personal Serum".

How to access the Digital Goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the game’s install directory within their respective folder in Steam\SteamApps\common\Serum after the DLC has finished downloading.
